name: gson09/dacs-root
description: Helper composer.json at repo root so Heroku PHP buildpack detects app in subfolder

post-install-cmd: if [ -f web/composer.json ]; then cd web && composer install --no-dev --optimize-autoloader; fi
post-update-cmd: if [ -f web/composer.json ]; then cd web && composer install --no-dev --optimize-autoloader; fi
scripts.heroku-post-build: if [ -f web/composer.json ]; then cd web && composer install --no-dev --optimize-autoloader; fi
